channel.title: How do you play already made servers
channel.description: i got phone scape and evil scape and stuff but how do you work them? i need help

item.title: How do you play already made servers
item.description:
@100 wrote:

can u please tell me how to write pause? do you just write pause at end of bat file?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 03:07:22 AM[/size][hr] :mad: :eek: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :o ;D

Read full topic
item.source: How do you play already made servers

item.title: How do you play already made servers
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

In the runserver batch file. Open runserver.bat in textpad or notepad and add the pause line after the last program line.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you play already made servers
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Ok, then something went wrong. I hope you have already tried everything in the FAQs and tutorials around here, like installing java, and the JDK.

If you have, then add a “Pause” line to the server batch file, and then the server window should stay open so you can see the error message which appears.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you play already made servers

item.title: How do you play already made servers
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

So now your server is running, as long as that window is open. Now open your moparscape client…and play.

item.title: How do you play already made servers
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Go to the folder where you downloaded your server, and click on the executable file, it should be called something similar to
“Runserver.bat”

You get an IP address from the advertisements section.

Read full topic

but how do you run it and how do i get ip adress?

item.source: How do you play already made servers

item.title: How do you play already made servers
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

The easiest way to join the server is to run your copy (phonescape) and then join it using your client (moparscape).

if your talking about starting a server to play on then go into the server folder like yours would be phonescape and click runserver and then log into moparscape and dont! click start server but instead click the enter button and put name and pass you want and log in! and

congrates you got in your own server

If you want to play with other people, join their server with your client:

If you are talking about playing on another person's server, then you go to the server list or look in the advertisements section and look at the IP and the port number. Simply copy and paste that.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you play already made servers
